release.action: Fixed class org.jdtaus.banking.util.BankleitzahlenDatei to use configuration property encoding for reading the bankfiles instead of the hardcoded ISO-8859-1 encoding.
Updated the XML module descriptor to the 1.1 model version. Added dependency to jdtaus-banking-messages artifact and removed any Messages previously implemented as inner classes.

Added classes
  • org.jdtaus.banking.util.swing.AlphaNumericText27TextField
  • org.jdtaus.banking.util.swing.BankleitzahlTextField
  • org.jdtaus.banking.util.swing.KontonummerTextField
  • org.jdtaus.banking.util.swing.Referenznummer10TextField
  • org.jdtaus.banking.util.swing.Referenznummer11TextField
Updated classes
  • org.jdtaus.banking.util.BankleitzahlenDatei:

    Added a constructor taking the encoding to use for reading a file.

Updated classes
  • org.jdtaus.banking.util.swing.AlphaNumericText27TextField
  • org.jdtaus.banking.util.swing.BankleitzahlTextField
  • org.jdtaus.banking.util.swing.KontonummerTextField
  • org.jdtaus.banking.util.swing.Referenznummer10TextField
  • org.jdtaus.banking.util.swing.Referenznummer11TextField
    • to additionally setup an AbstractFormatterFactory during instantiation.
Added various missing serial version UID fields. Updated to latest mojo releases.
Updated class org.jdtaus.banking.util.BankleitzahlenDatei to support records getting readded by an update with a more recent file.

Upgraded to latest core features.
  • Removed any internal properties resources and moved any messages to the META-INF/jdtaus/module.xml module descriptor.
  • Added support for compatibility checking.
Made swing text fields of package org.jdtaus.banking.util.swing non-validating by default.
Upgraded to jDTAUS Core version 1.8 to support exchanging references to the java.util.Locale implementation to use.
